data.eml:eml: A new species of Aphidura Hille Ris Lambers, and additional data for Aphidura pakistanensis (Hemiptera: Aphididae) from Republic of Georgia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Barjadze, Shalva (2019): A new species of Aphidura Hille Ris Lambers, and additional data for Aphidura pakistanensis (Hemiptera: Aphididae) from Republic of Georgia. Zootaxa 4683 (3): 421-430, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4683.3.6
